expo.name: book-repo
expo.description:
For the first time if you open the app 
  : For the very first time it can take some time. So be patient.
  : Once you will get Login Page 
      => Login
      =>  If you are new to the account
      =>  You should choose sign in
  
Once you are logged In or Signed in 
  => For every time you will automatically get the actual Home Page 
        => If the home page doesn't have any data it will automatically show a spinner
  
        => You should add some books.
      
              : Go to drawer-> add the book
    Add Page ->
             Functionality:
                  => In add book, if your author is not mentioned you should choose to add author
                        => Type Name and Save.
                  => Now fill the form. and submit. you will automatically navigate to the main page. 
    Main Page ->
           DML: here you can update rating or delete entries you have entered
           View: 
                 1. You can see similar books written by the same writer
                 2. You can see books by rating
                      => If the number of rating it will show all books again
